languages.text: Лагеря повстанцев все же были обнаружены и блокированы, но заминка в ходе операции дала боевикам возможность подготовить и осуществить последний удар — серию терактов на важнейших оборонительных комплексах планеты. Это был отчаянный акт бессильной злобы.

traits.locale_text: Лагеря повстанцев все же были обнаружены и блокированы, но заминка в ходе операции дала боевикам возможность подготовить и осуществить последний удар — серию терактов на важнейших оборонительных комплексах планеты. Это был отчаянный акт бессильной злобы.

languages.text: The rebels' camps were nevertheless located and surrounded, but the setback earlier in the operation had given the fighters a chance to prepare and strike their final blow, carrying out a series of terrorist attacks on the planet's vital security sites. It was a desperate act of senseless malice.
languages.original_text: Лагеря повстанцев все же были обнаружены и блокированы, но заминка в ходе операции дала боевикам возможность подготовить и осуществить последний удар — серию терактов на важнейших оборонительных комплексах планеты. Это был отчаянный акт бессильной злобы.

traits.locale_text: The rebels' camps were nevertheless located and surrounded, but the setback earlier in the operation had given the fighters a chance to prepare and strike their final blow, carrying out a series of terrorist attacks on the planet's vital security sites. It was a desperate act of senseless malice.

The rebels' camps were nevertheless located and surrounded, but the setback earlier in the operation had given the fighters a chance to prepare and strike their final blow, carrying out a series of terrorist attacks on the planet's vital security sites. It was a desperate act of senseless malice.

The rebels' camps were nevertheless located and surrounded, but the setback earlier in the operation had given the fighters a chance to prepare and strike their final blow, carrying out a series of terrorist attacks on the planet's vital security sites. It was a desperate act of senseless malice.

The rebels' camps were nevertheless located and surrounded, but the setback earlier in the operation had given the fighters a chance to prepare and strike their final blow, carrying out a series of terrorist attacks on the planet's vital security sites. It was a desperate act of senseless malice.

languages.text: それでも反乱軍のキャンプを突き止めて包囲したものの、作戦が前半で滞ったために、反乱軍の戦闘員たちに準備をし最終攻撃に臨むチャンスを与えてしまった。結果、この星の安全保障上極めて重要な拠点が一連のテロ攻撃を受けた。悪意を無差別にばらまく、絶望的な行為だった。
languages.original_text: The rebels' camps were nevertheless located and surrounded, but the setback earlier in the operation had given the fighters a chance to prepare and strike their final blow, carrying out a series of terrorist attacks on the planet's vital security sites. It was a desperate act of senseless malice.

traits.locale_text: それでも反乱軍のキャンプを突き止めて包囲したものの、作戦が前半で滞ったために、反乱軍の戦闘員たちに準備をし最終攻撃に臨むチャンスを与えてしまった。結果、この星の安全保障上極めて重要な拠点が一連のテロ攻撃を受けた。悪意を無差別にばらまく、絶望的な行為だった。

languages.text: 即便如此，政府军最终还是找到了叛军的营地，将其团团包围。然而，之前行动中的失利让叛乱分子得到了足够的时间，进行了最后的行动。他们对行星上所有重要的安全场所发动了一系列恐怖袭击。这样的绝望行为无法扭转局势，但充满了恶意。
languages.original_text: The rebels' camps were nevertheless located and surrounded, but the setback earlier in the operation had given the fighters a chance to prepare and strike their final blow, carrying out a series of terrorist attacks on the planet's vital security sites. It was a desperate act of senseless malice.

traits.locale_text: 即便如此，政府军最终还是找到了叛军的营地，将其团团包围。然而，之前行动中的失利让叛乱分子得到了足够的时间，进行了最后的行动。他们对行星上所有重要的安全场所发动了一系列恐怖袭击。这样的绝望行为无法扭转局势，但充满了恶意。

languages.text: Aun así, los campamentos rebeldes fueron localizados y cercados, pero el anterior varapalo para la operación había concedido a los guerrilleros una ocasión para prepararse y asestar un último golpe, perpetrando una serie de atentados terroristas en los centros de seguridad más importantes del planeta. Fue un acto desesperado de rencor sin sentido.
languages.original_text: The rebels' camps were nevertheless located and surrounded, but the setback earlier in the operation had given the fighters a chance to prepare and strike their final blow, carrying out a series of terrorist attacks on the planet's vital security sites. It was a desperate act of senseless malice.

traits.locale_text: Aun así, los campamentos rebeldes fueron localizados y cercados, pero el anterior varapalo para la operación había concedido a los guerrilleros una ocasión para prepararse y asestar un último golpe, perpetrando una serie de atentados terroristas en los centros de seguridad más importantes del planeta. Fue un acto desesperado de rencor sin sentido.

languages.text: Letztlich wurden die Rebellenlager dennoch ausfindig gemacht und umstellt, aber der Rückschlag vorher bei der Operation hatte den Kämpfern Gelegenheit gegeben, ihren letzten Schlag vorzubereiten, und sie führten mehrere Terroranschläge auf die entscheidenden Sicherheitszentren des Planeten durch. Es war eine Verzweiflungstat aus sinnloser Bösartigkeit.
languages.original_text: The rebels' camps were nevertheless located and surrounded, but the setback earlier in the operation had given the fighters a chance to prepare and strike their final blow, carrying out a series of terrorist attacks on the planet's vital security sites. It was a desperate act of senseless malice.

traits.locale_text: Letztlich wurden die Rebellenlager dennoch ausfindig gemacht und umstellt, aber der Rückschlag vorher bei der Operation hatte den Kämpfern Gelegenheit gegeben, ihren letzten Schlag vorzubereiten, und sie führten mehrere Terroranschläge auf die entscheidenden Sicherheitszentren des Planeten durch. Es war eine Verzweiflungstat aus sinnloser Bösartigkeit.

languages.text: Les camps des rebelles finirent tout de même par être localisés et encerclés, mais le revers essuyé au début de l'opération avait laissé aux combattants une chance de se préparer pour donner le coup ultime : une série d'attaques terroristes sur les sites de sécurité vitaux de la planète, dans un dernier acte désespéré de malveillance insensée.
languages.original_text: The rebels' camps were nevertheless located and surrounded, but the setback earlier in the operation had given the fighters a chance to prepare and strike their final blow, carrying out a series of terrorist attacks on the planet's vital security sites. It was a desperate act of senseless malice.

traits.locale_text: Les camps des rebelles finirent tout de même par être localisés et encerclés, mais le revers essuyé au début de l'opération avait laissé aux combattants une chance de se préparer pour donner le coup ultime : une série d'attaques terroristes sur les sites de sécurité vitaux de la planète, dans un dernier acte désespéré de malveillance insensée.

languages.text: İsyancıların kampları bir şekilde tespit edilip çevrelense de operasyonda çıkagelen aksilikten istifade eden savaşçılar, son bir saldırı yapma fırsatı elde edince gezegenin önemli güvenlik bölgelerinde birçok terör saldırısı gerçekleştirdi. Bu, umutsuzca icra edilmiş bir saf kötülük eyleminden ibaretti.
languages.original_text: The rebels' camps were nevertheless located and surrounded, but the setback earlier in the operation had given the fighters a chance to prepare and strike their final blow, carrying out a series of terrorist attacks on the planet's vital security sites. It was a desperate act of senseless malice.

traits.locale_text: İsyancıların kampları bir şekilde tespit edilip çevrelense de operasyonda çıkagelen aksilikten istifade eden savaşçılar, son bir saldırı yapma fırsatı elde edince gezegenin önemli güvenlik bölgelerinde birçok terör saldırısı gerçekleştirdi. Bu, umutsuzca icra edilmiş bir saf kötülük eyleminden ibaretti.
